mapper.select: SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV ORDER BY WCV.ID ASC OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY

SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} ORDER BY WCV.ID ASC OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, '%')) ORDER BY WCV.ID ASC OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, '%'))

SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV ORDER BY WCV.POPULATION ASC FETCH FIRST #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY

SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV ORDER BY WCV.POPULATION DESC FETCH FIRST #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
SELECT WCV.ID , WCV.CONTINENT , WCV.NATION , WCV.NAME , WCV.DISTRICT , WCV.POPULATION , WCV.LANGUAGE FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
